metadata.intro:
This sample demonstrates notifications with custom content views. It also demonstrates the expanded notification introduced in API level 16.
This sample shows all the required steps to create and display custom notifications:
- Create Intent to launch Activity when notification is clicked. - Define custom layouts for collapsed and expanded views. - Use NotificationManager's notify to show notification.
In the sample, click on the "SHOW NOTIFICATION" button to create a notification. Use two-fingered gestures up and down to collapse and expand the notification.
